===================================== **Tender Cancellation Notice: PW-22-01008423** ### Tender Details | **Field** | **Value** | | --- | --- | | **Reference Number** | PW-22-01008423 | | **Solicitation Number** | 1000236166 | | **Publication Date** | 2022-09-27 | | **Tender Cancellation Date** | 2022-10-11T14:00:00 | ### Contract Information * **G-SIN Codes**: D302A, D302AAH * **Procurement Category**: Services (SRV) * **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Limited Tendering * **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions) ### Trade Agreements The tender is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA). ### Regions * **Region of Opportunity**: Alberta * **Region of Delivery**: Alberta ### Contracting Entity * **Name**: Indigenous Services Canada * **Address**: 10 Wellington St., Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0H4, Canada ### Contact Information * **Name**: Bruno Paradis * **Email**: [bruno.paradis2@sac-isc.gc.ca](mailto:bruno.paradis2@sac-isc.gc.ca) * **Phone**: Not available * **Fax**: Not available * **Address**: 10 rue Wellington,
Gatineaau QC,
K1A 0H4,
CA ### Notice Description This tender has been cancelled. All related activities have been ceased. For any additional information, please contact Bruno Paradis. {{ testimonials mary}} ===================================== RewrittenOutput.NavBar===================================== Note: I rewrote this text completely, with some minor changes to the original numbering and paragraph structure for readability. There are still a few clarifications that can be done, like defining G-SIN and general information for publication, Company meeting during online promotion thus save down time. Feedback? SwiftUI
